metadata.author: Filewall - support@filewall.com
metadata.comments: Solution template for Filewall for Microsoft 365

metadata.description: Not used, but needed to pass arm-ttk test `Location-Should-Not-Be-Hardcoded`.  We instead use the `workspace-location` which is derived from the LA workspace
[concat('Region to deploy solution resources -- separate from location selection',parameters('location'))]
Workspace name for Log Analytics where Microsoft Sentinel is setup
resource group name where Microsoft Sentinel is setup
subscription id where Microsoft Sentinel is setup

connectorUiConfig.title: Filewall for Microsoft 365
connectorUiConfig.descriptionMarkdown: Ingest events from Filewall into Microsoft Sentinel (Exchange, SharePoint, OneDrive and Teams).

sampleQueries.query: {{graphQueriesTableName}} | where event_type == "email_log" | mv-expand attachment = attachments | where tostring(attachment.status) == "blocked" | project TimeGenerated, sender, recipient, subject, attachment_name = tostring(attachment.name), attachment_mime_type = tostring(attachment.type), attachment_block_reason = tostring(attachment.block_reason), attachment_summary = tostring(attachment.summary)

resourceProvider.permissionsDisplayText: Read and Write permissions are required.

customs.name: Filewall API access
customs.description: A Filewall API key is required.

instructionSteps.description: Click **Add connection**, paste your Filewall API key, and click **Connect**. This will create 4 polling connections (Exchange, SharePoint, OneDrive, Teams).

parameters.label: Filewall API Key
parameters.tooltip: Paste the Filewall API key from the Filewall admin console.
parameters.name: apiKey

dataFlows.transformKql: source | extend file_type = tostring(type) | project-away type

metadata.description: Sets the time name for analysis.

properties.serializedData:
{"version":"Notebook/1.0","name":"Filewall for Microsoft 365 - Overview","description":"Unified visibility for Exchange, SharePoint, OneDrive and Teams using Filewall log data.","items":[{"type":1,"name":"text - title","content":{"json":"
Filewall for Microsoft 365 - Overview
Unified visibility for Exchange, SharePoint, OneDrive and Teams using Filewall log data.
"}},{"type":9,"name":"parameters - timerange","content":{"version":"KqlParameterItem/1.0","parameters":[{"id":"2bb4bd2d-3f6c-4a49-8b28-9c65f2df2f50","version":"KqlParameterItem/1.0","name":"TimeRange","type":4,"description":"Sets the time for analysis","isGlobal":true,"typeSettings":{"selectableValues":[{"durationMs":300000},{"durationMs":900000},{"durationMs":1800000},{"durationMs":3600000},{"durationMs":14400000},{"durationMs":43200000},{"durationMs":86400000},{"durationMs":172800000},{"durationMs":259200000},{"durationMs":604800000},{"durationMs":1209600000},{"durationMs":2419200000},{"durationMs":2592000000},{"durationMs":5184000000},{"durationMs":7776000000}],"allowCustom":true},"timeContext":{"durationMs":604800000},"value":{"durationMs":604800000}}],"style":"pills","queryType":0,"resourceType":"microsoft.operationalinsights/workspaces"}},{"type":3,"name":"query - events-by-platform","content":{"version":"KqlItem/1.0","query":"let exch=imExchangeEventFilewallM365()|summarize Count=count()|extend Platform='Exchange'; let sp=imFileEventFilewallM365()|where tolower(application)=='sharepoint'|summarize Count=count()|extend Platform='SharePoint'; let od=imFileEventFilewallM365()|where tolower(application)=='onedrive'|summarize Count=count()|extend Platform='OneDrive'; let tm=imFileEventFilewallM365()|where tolower(application)=='teams'|summarize Count=count()|extend Platform='Teams'; exch|union sp|union od|union tm","size":1,"title":"Events by platform","timeContextFromParameter":"TimeRange","queryType":0,"resourceType":"microsoft.operationalinsights/workspaces","visualization":"piechart"}},{"type":3,"name":"query - time-by-platform","content":{"version":"KqlItem/1.0","query":"let exch=imExchangeEventFilewallM365()|project TimeGenerated,Platform='Exchange'; let files=imFileEventFilewallM365() | extend Platform=case( tolower(application)=='sharepoint','SharePoint', tolower(application)=='onedrive','OneDrive', tolower(application)=='teams','Teams', 'Other') | project TimeGenerated,Platform; exch | union files | where Platform in ('Exchange','SharePoint','OneDrive','Teams') | summarize Count=count() by Platform, bin(TimeGenerated, 1h) | order by TimeGenerated asc","size":1,"title":"Events over time (by platform)","timeContextFromParameter":"TimeRange","queryType":0,"resourceType":"microsoft.operationalinsights/workspaces","visualization":"timechart"}},{"type":3,"name":"query - top-senders","content":{"version":"KqlItem/1.0","query":"imExchangeEventFilewallM365() | where status == 'blocked' | summarize BlockedEmails=count() by EmailSenderFrom | top 20 by BlockedEmails desc","size":0,"title":"Top senders with blocked emails","timeContextFromParameter":"TimeRange","queryType":0,"resourceType":"microsoft.operationalinsights/workspaces","visualization":"table"}},{"type":3,"name":"query - blocked-attachments","content":{"version":"KqlItem/1.0","query":"FilewallExchange_CL | where event_type == "email_log" | mv-expand attachment = attachments | where tostring(attachment.status) == "blocked" | extend size_string = tostring(attachment.size) | extend size_number = todouble(extract(@"^([\d\.]+)", 1, size_string)) | extend size_unit = extract(@"[A-Za-z]+$", 0, size_string) | extend size_bytes = case( size_unit =~ "B", size_number, size_unit =~ "KB", size_number * 1024, size_unit =~ "MB", size_number * 1024 * 1024, size_unit =~ "GB", size_number * 1024 * 1024 * 1024, size_number) | project TimeGenerated, sender, recipient, subject, attachment_name = tostring(attachment.name), attachment_mime_type = tostring(attachment.type), attachment_status = tostring(attachment.status), attachment_block_reason = tostring(attachment.block_reason), attachment_summary = tostring(attachment.summary), attachment_size_human = size_string, attachment_size_bytes = size_bytes, attachment_original_sha1 = tostring(attachment.original_sha1), attachment_original_sha256 = tostring(attachment.original_sha256)","size":0,"title":"Blocked Filewall attachments (Exchange)","timeContextFromParameter":"TimeRange","queryType":0,"resourceType":"microsoft.operationalinsights/workspaces","visualization":"table","gridSettings":{"formatters":[{"columnMatch":"attachment_status","formatter":18,"formatOptions":{"thresholdsOptions":"iconsOnly","thresholdsGrid":[{"operator":"==","thresholdValue":"blocked","representation":"red"}]}},{"columnMatch":"attachment_size_bytes","formatter":8,"formatOptions":{"min":0,"max":104857600}}]}}},{"type":3,"name":"query - all-attachments","content":{"version":"KqlItem/1.0","query":"FilewallExchange_CL | where event_type == "email_log" | mv-expand attachment = attachments | extend size_string = tostring(attachment.size) | extend size_number = todouble(extract(@"^([\d\.]+)", 1, size_string)) | extend size_unit = extract(@"[A-Za-z]+$", 0, size_string) | extend size_bytes = case( size_unit =~ "B", size_number, size_unit =~ "KB", size_number * 1024, size_unit =~ "MB", size_number * 1024 * 1024, size_unit =~ "GB", size_number * 1024 * 1024 * 1024, size_number) | project TimeGenerated, sender, recipient, subject, attachment_name = tostring(attachment.name), attachment_mime_type = tostring(attachment.type), attachment_status = tostring(attachment.status), attachment_block_reason = tostring(attachment.block_reason), attachment_summary = tostring(attachment.summary), attachment_size_human = size_string, attachment_size_bytes = size_bytes, attachment_original_sha1 = tostring(attachment.original_sha1), attachment_original_sha256 = tostring(attachment.original_sha256)","size":0,"title":"All Filewall attachments (Exchange)","timeContextFromParameter":"TimeRange","queryType":0,"resourceType":"microsoft.operationalinsights/workspaces","visualization":"table"}}],"fromTemplateId":"sentinel-FilewallM365Workbook","$schema":"https://github.com/Microsoft/Application-Insights-Workbooks/blob/master/schema/workbook.json"}

properties.description: @{workbookKey=FilewallM365Workbook; logoFileName=filewall-logo.svg; description=Sets the time name for analysis.; dataTypesDependencies=System.Object[]; dataConnectorsDependencies=System.Object[]; previewImagesFileNames=System.Object[]; version=1.0.0; title=Filewall for Microsoft 365 - Overview; templateRelativePath=FilewallM365Overview.json; subtitle=; provider=Microsoft}.description
ExchangeEventFilewallM365 Data Parser with template version 3.0.0

properties.query:
FilewallExchange_CL
| extend EventStartTime = TimeGenerated, EventEndTime = TimeGenerated,
        EventOriginalType = tostring(event_type),
        EventType = case(status =~ "blocked" or status =~ "failed", "ThreatInfo", status =~ "succeed", "Informational", "Informational"),
        EventResult = case(status =~ "blocked", 'Blocked', status =~ "failed", "Failure", status =~ "succeed", "Success", "NA"),
        EventOriginalResultDetails = coalesce(state, summary),
        EventSeverity = case(status =~ "blocked", "High", status =~ "failed", "Medium", "Informational"),
        EventVendor = "ODI-X",
        EventProduct = "Filewall for Microsoft 365",
        EventUid = tostring(event_id),
        EmailSubject = subject,
        EmailSenderFrom = sender,
        EmailRecipientTo = recipient,
        EmailNetworkMessageId = mail_id,
        AlertPolicyId = policy_id,
        AlertPolicyName = policy_name,
        User = recipient,
        ActorUsername = sender,
        Dvc = application,
        DvcHostname = application,
        EventSchema = "Alert",
        EventSchemaVersion = "0.1.0",
        EventCount = int(1)
| project TimeGenerated, EventStartTime, EventEndTime, EventUid, EventType, EventOriginalType, EventResult, EventOriginalResultDetails, EventSeverity, EventVendor, EventProduct, EventSchema, EventSchemaVersion, EventCount, Dvc, DvcHostname, User, ActorUsername, EmailSubject, EmailSenderFrom, EmailRecipientTo, EmailNetworkMessageId, AlertPolicyId, AlertPolicyName, application, event_id, timestamp, status, state, summary, attachments, release_timestamp, release_by_admin, release_reason

FilewallExchange_CL
| extend EventStartTime = TimeGenerated, EventEndTime = TimeGenerated,
        EventOriginalType = tostring(event_type),
        EventType = case(status =~ "blocked" or status =~ "failed", "ThreatInfo", status =~ "succeed", "Informational", "Informational"),
        EventResult = case(status =~ "blocked", 'Blocked', status =~ "failed", "Failure", status =~ "succeed", "Success", "NA"),
        EventOriginalResultDetails = coalesce(state, summary),
        EventSeverity = case(status =~ "blocked", "High", status =~ "failed", "Medium", "Informational"),
        EventVendor = "ODI-X",
        EventProduct = "Filewall for Microsoft 365",
        EventUid = tostring(event_id),
        EmailSubject = subject,
        EmailSenderFrom = sender,
        EmailRecipientTo = recipient,
        EmailNetworkMessageId = mail_id,
        AlertPolicyId = policy_id,
        AlertPolicyName = policy_name,
        User = recipient,
        ActorUsername = sender,
        Dvc = application,
        DvcHostname = application,
        EventSchema = "Alert",
        EventSchemaVersion = "0.1.0",
        EventCount = int(1)
| project TimeGenerated, EventStartTime, EventEndTime, EventUid, EventType, EventOriginalType, EventResult, EventOriginalResultDetails, EventSeverity, EventVendor, EventProduct, EventSchema, EventSchemaVersion, EventCount, Dvc, DvcHostname, User, ActorUsername, EmailSubject, EmailSenderFrom, EmailRecipientTo, EmailNetworkMessageId, AlertPolicyId, AlertPolicyName, application, event_id, timestamp, status, state, summary, attachments, release_timestamp, release_by_admin, release_reason

properties.description: FileEventFilewallM365 Data Parser with template version 3.0.0

properties.query:
FilewallFile_CL
| extend EventStartTime = TimeGenerated, EventEndTime = TimeGenerated,
        EventOriginalType = tostring(event_type),
        EventType = case(status =~ "blocked", "FileBlocked", status =~ "succeed", "FileModified", status =~ "failed", "FileError", "FileEvent"),
        EventResult = case(status =~ "blocked", 'Blocked', status =~ "failed", "Failure", status =~ "succeed", "Success", "NA"),
        EventOriginalResultDetails = coalesce(block_reason, state, summary),
        EventSeverity = case(status =~ "blocked", "High", status =~ "failed", "Medium", "Informational"),
        EventVendor = "ODI-X",
        EventProduct = "Filewall for Microsoft 365",
        TargetFileName = name,
        TargetFilePath = path,
        TargetFilePathType = application,
        TargetFileExtension = file_type,
        TargetFileSize = tolong(size),
        TargetFileHashSha1 = coalesce(new_sha1, original_sha1),
        TargetFileHashSha256 = coalesce(new_sha256, original_sha256),
        ActorUsername = owner,
        ActorUserType = "Regular",
        User = owner,
        DvcHostname = coalesce(site_name, drive_name),
        Dvc = coalesce(site_name, drive_name),
        EventSchema = "FileEvent",
        EventSchemaVersion = "0.2.2",
        EventCount = int(1)
| project TimeGenerated, EventStartTime, EventEndTime, EventType, EventOriginalType, EventResult, EventOriginalResultDetails, EventSeverity, EventVendor, EventProduct, EventSchema, EventSchemaVersion, EventCount, Dvc, DvcHostname, ActorUsername, ActorUserType, User, TargetFileName, TargetFilePath, TargetFilePathType, TargetFileExtension, TargetFileSize, TargetFileHashSha1, TargetFileHashSha256, application, event_id, timestamp, status, state, policy_id, policy_name, block_reason, summary, drive_name, site_name, new_sha1, original_sha1, new_sha256, original_sha256, version

FilewallFile_CL
| extend EventStartTime = TimeGenerated, EventEndTime = TimeGenerated,
        EventOriginalType = tostring(event_type),
        EventType = case(status =~ "blocked", "FileBlocked", status =~ "succeed", "FileModified", status =~ "failed", "FileError", "FileEvent"),
        EventResult = case(status =~ "blocked", 'Blocked', status =~ "failed", "Failure", status =~ "succeed", "Success", "NA"),
        EventOriginalResultDetails = coalesce(block_reason, state, summary),
        EventSeverity = case(status =~ "blocked", "High", status =~ "failed", "Medium", "Informational"),
        EventVendor = "ODI-X",
        EventProduct = "Filewall for Microsoft 365",
        TargetFileName = name,
        TargetFilePath = path,
        TargetFilePathType = application,
        TargetFileExtension = file_type,
        TargetFileSize = tolong(size),
        TargetFileHashSha1 = coalesce(new_sha1, original_sha1),
        TargetFileHashSha256 = coalesce(new_sha256, original_sha256),
        ActorUsername = owner,
        ActorUserType = "Regular",
        User = owner,
        DvcHostname = coalesce(site_name, drive_name),
        Dvc = coalesce(site_name, drive_name),
        EventSchema = "FileEvent",
        EventSchemaVersion = "0.2.2",
        EventCount = int(1)
| project TimeGenerated, EventStartTime, EventEndTime, EventType, EventOriginalType, EventResult, EventOriginalResultDetails, EventSeverity, EventVendor, EventProduct, EventSchema, EventSchemaVersion, EventCount, Dvc, DvcHostname, ActorUsername, ActorUserType, User, TargetFileName, TargetFilePath, TargetFilePathType, TargetFileExtension, TargetFileSize, TargetFileHashSha1, TargetFileHashSha256, application, event_id, timestamp, status, state, policy_id, policy_name, block_reason, summary, drive_name, site_name, new_sha1, original_sha1, new_sha256, original_sha256, version

properties.description: BlockedEmails_AnalyticalRules Analytics Rule with template version 3.0.0
Scheduled rule that creates incidents for emails blocked by Filewall for Microsoft 365 (Exchange).
properties.query:
imExchangeEventFilewallM365()
| where EventVendor == 'ODI-X' and EventProduct == 'Filewall for Microsoft 365'
| where EventType == 'ThreatInfo' and EventResult == 'Blocked'

properties.description: BlockedFiles_AnalyticalRules Analytics Rule with template version 3.0.0
Scheduled rule that creates incidents for files blocked by Filewall for Microsoft 365 (Sharepoint/Onedrive/Teams).
properties.query:
imFileEventFilewallM365()
| where EventVendor == 'ODI-X' and EventProduct == 'Filewall for Microsoft 365'
| where EventType == 'FileBlocked'

properties.descriptionHtml:
Note: Please refer to the following before installing the solution:

Review the solution Release Notes

There may be known issues pertaining to this Solution, please refer to them before installing.

Filewall for Microsoft 365 solution installs a Codeless (CCF/CLv2) connector that ingests Filewall activity logs for Exchange, SharePoint, OneDrive and Teams into custom tables. It also installs parsers, analytics rules and a workbook for visibility.

Data Connectors: 1, Parsers: 2, Workbooks: 1, Analytic Rules: 2

Learn more about Microsoft Sentinel | Learn more about Solutions
